name: protobuf-as
description: Minimalistic protobuf compiler plugin which generates self-enclosed AssemblyScript code

scripts.build:tsd: yarn run asc assembly/encoder.ts -d assembly/encoder.d.ts && yarn run asc assembly/decoder.ts -d assembly/decoder.d.ts && yarn run asc assembly/sizer.ts -d assembly/sizer.d.ts && yarn run asc assembly/protobuf_interop.ts -d assembly/protobuf_interop.d.ts --exportRuntime
scripts.gen:teleport: protoc -I/Users/gzigzigzeo/go/src/github.com/gravitational/teleport/api/types -I/Users/gzigzigzeo/go/src/github.com/gravitational/teleport/api/types/wrappers -I/Users/gzigzigzeo/go/src/github.com/gravitational/teleport/vendor/github.com/gogo/protobuf/ -I/Users/gzigzigzeo/go/src --plugin=./bin/protoc-gen-as  --as_out=tmp/assembly --plugin node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --as_opt enableInterop=true:targetFileName=teleport.ts --ts_proto_opt=outputJsonMethods=false,outputTypeRegistry=false,outputClientImpl=false,outputServices=false,addGrpcMetadata=false --ts_proto_out=tmp types.proto events/events.proto && yarn asc tmp/assembly/teleport.ts --tsdFile tmp/assembly/teleport.d.ts

author: Victor Sokolov <gzigzigzeo@gmail.com>
